li.class: gecbgBlue fade mainMenu menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-9543
gecbgBlue fade mainMenu menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-9544

div.p: The Goodwill Excel Center is a unique, tuition-free adult charter high school that awards industry recognized certifications and high school diplomas, not GEDs, to adult learners in the District.

The first of its kind in the District, the Excel Center responds to the fact that life commitments, and circumstances can often stop people from continuing their high school education. We do this by offering access to transportation assistance, child care and flexible class schedules.
Learn More

div.small: Translation Services: Español | 中文 | Việt Nam | 한국어 | Français | አማርኛ

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

span.a: 3/13/20 Goodwill Excel Center Corona Virus Letter

div.span: Our admissions process is quick and easy!

ol.li: You will receive a confirmation email upon application submission.

div.span: Earning a high school diploma can make a positive and lasting impact on your life.

div.p: High school graduates can earn up to $10,000 more per year than high school dropouts.
High school graduates are 72% more likely to be employed than high school dropouts.

div.span: We support the whole student, and respond to the fact that life commitments, and circumstances can often stop people from continuing their high school education. We do this by offering...

img.br: We support our students in getting to class.
Free child care while you're attending class.
Class schedules tailored to each student’s situation.

div.span: Questions about The Goodwill Excel Center? Let us know.

p.br:
1776 G Street, NW
Washington, DC 20006
Directions

small.em: (The Goodwill Excel Center entrance is located on 18th Street.)

2 blocks from Farragut North & 1 block from Farragut West Metro Stations
On the Metro Bus 80 route.

small.strong: The Goodwill Excel Center Nondiscriminatory Policy As To Students

div.p: The Goodwill Excel Center, Public Charter School admits students of any race, color, national and ethnic origin to all the rights, privileges, programs, and activities generally accorded or made available to students at the school. It does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national and ethnic origin in administration of its educational policies, admissions policies, financial assistance and other school-administered programs.
